data.SOURCE:
@EndUserText.label: 'NFe Item - Child Entity'
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
define view entity /EXEDMINB/I_NFEITEM
  as select from /EXEDMINB/T_NFEITEM
  
  //Itens da divisão
  composition [0..*] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEITEMDIV as _ItensDiv

  //ICMS
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS00  as _ICMS00
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS02  as _ICMS02
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS10  as _ICMS10
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS15  as _ICMS15
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS20  as _ICMS20
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS30  as _ICMS30
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS40  as _ICMS40
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS51  as _ICMS51
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS53  as _ICMS53
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS60  as _ICMS60
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS61  as _ICMS61
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS70  as _ICMS70
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMS90  as _ICMS90
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTxICMSPart as _ICMSPart
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTaxICMSST  as _ICMSST

  //Simples Nacional
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTICMSSN101 as _ICMSSN101
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTICMSSN102 as _ICMSSN102
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTICMSSN201 as _ICMSSN201
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTICMSSN202 as _ICMSSN202
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTICMSSN500 as _ICMSSN500
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFeTICMSSN900 as _ICMSSN900

  //Outros Tributos
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETAXIPI     as _IPI
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETAXII      as _II
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETAXPIS     as _PIS
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETAXPISST   as _PISST
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETAXCOFINS  as _COFINS
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETXCOFINSST as _COFINSST
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEICMSUFDEST as _ICMSUFDEST 

  association to parent /EXEDMINB/I_NFEHEADER     as _Header on _Header.Id = $projection.Id

{
  key Id,
  key ItemId,
  
      cProd,
      cEAN,
      xProd,
      NCM,
      CFOP,
      uCom,
      qCom,
      vUnCom,
      vProd,
      cEANTrib,
      uTrib,
      qTrib,
      vUnTrib,
      indTot,
      vTotTrib,
      xPed,
      nItemPed,
      isSplit,

      /* Associaçao com Cabeçalho */
      _Header,
      
      /* Composition com itens da divisão */
      _ItensDiv,

      /* Associações Impostos */
      _ICMS00,
      _ICMS02,
      _ICMS10,
      _ICMS15,
      _ICMS20,
      _ICMS30,
      _ICMS40,
      _ICMS51,
      _ICMS53,
      _ICMS60,
      _ICMS61,
      _ICMS70,
      _ICMS90,
      _ICMSPart,
      _ICMSST,
      _ICMSSN101,
      _ICMSSN102,
      _ICMSSN201,
      _ICMSSN202,
      _ICMSSN500,
      _ICMSSN900,
      _IPI,
      _II,
      _PIS,
      _PISST,
      _COFINS,
      _COFINSST,
      _ICMSUFDEST
}
/*+[internal] {
"BASEINFO":
{
"FROM":
[],
"ASSOCIATED":
[
"/EXEDMINB/I_NFEHEADER",
